Okay guys, this was the post that I never wrote, or was on the net to
write. So forget this, (and whoever wrote it, don't do it again. I don't
know how you did it) post, and go with mine below.

> Megatron snickered a sarcastic snicker.  "What a fool...You call I,
> Megatron, weak?  Don't let your mouth make your face what mine has become
> right now..." Megatron said, referring to the missing half of his head and
> face.

BIC:
Megatron looked at Firestrike, his one functioning eye narrowed.
"Megatron never looks weak." he whispered in a serious frame of mind.
"You are to young, to impetuous, to turn my troops on me, and you will
come out looking weak, if you continue this pathetic power strugle.
Menasor, dispose of the infiltrator." he snapped.

Menasor finally heard something he liked, his eyes narrowed, as his
teeth gritted. "Menasor....crush" he roared, as he began to close his
one hand around Slaughter's head as hard as possible, and with the other
hand he squeezed Slaughter's body.
